thread.title: Israeli army probing death of disabled man killed in Gaza

title: Israeli army probing death of disabled man killed in Gaza
text:
Israeli army probing death of disabled man killed in Gaza   01:04 
The Israeli military said on Thursday it would further investigate the death of a wheechair-bound Palestinian who was killed in clashes over U.S. President Donald Trump's recognition of Jerusalem as Israel's capital.   
The Israeli military said on Thursday it would further investigate the death of a wheechair-bound Palestinian who was killed in clashes over U.S. President Donald Trump's recognition of Jerusalem as Israel's capital.  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/01/04/israeli-army-probing-death-of-disabled-m?videoId=378135745&videoChannel=13423
